mapper.insert: insert into db_savenumtasklog (ID, TASKID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, OPERTIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, DESCR, ORIGINDESCR) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{change,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{relationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{origindescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_savenumtasklog set TASKID = #{taskid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'TYPE' = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'CHANGE' = #{change,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RELATIONID = #{relationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ORIGINDESCR = #{origindescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, TASKID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, OPERTIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, DESCR, ORIGINDESCR from db_savenumtasklog where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, TASKID, SOURCEID, PRODUCTID, QUANTITY, COSTPRICE, 'TYPE', OPER, OPERTIME, 'CHANGE', RELATIONID, DESCR, ORIGINDESCR from db_savenumtasklog
